price: Òǹsọ̀rọ̀ kan nínú wọn yóò sọ pé: "Dájúdájú èmi ní ọ̀rẹ́ kan
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum innī kāna lī qarīnun
